div.div: This search form uses an instant search feature. As you type, search results will appear automatically below the search field. When you've entered you desired search terms use tab to navigate through the available results and hit enter to open the selected page or document.

div.p: HS Continuous Learning Zoom Meeting HS Continuous Learning Lesson Plans High School Instructors Office Hours. 1:00 - 2:00 Daily. You can call, email, or text teachers...
USD 271 Stockton Continuous Learning Plan “Relationships before Rigor, Grace before Grades, Patience before Programs, Love before Lessons” --Dr. Brad Johnson USD 271...

p.a: Event: JH Track @ Hill City 10:00 am
Event: KAYS End of Year Celebration 7:00 pm
Event: HS SB vs Republic County @ Plainville 3:00 pm
Event: K-5 Music Program 7:00 pm @ SHS Gym
Event: NW Dist. Banquet @ Hays/Atwood 4:00 pm
Event: HS SB vs Ellis @ Plainville 4:00 pm

div.p: It's time to enroll our preschool and kindergarten aged students! We are so excited to welcome you to SGS! Please call SGS next week! #TigerPride271 view image

Hooray for Friday!
Friday, 4-24, lunch will be Chicken nuggets, fresh veggie boat, fruit surprise, and milk.
Next day breakfast will be, Frudel, juice, and milk.
Come see the amazing staff and teachers and share a grin from ear to ear!
Friday is SGS Community Group Day! A schedule was shared to each SeeSaw class! Please contact your child’s teacher if you can’t locate the details! #TigerPride view image
Thank you to our amazing administrative assistants! #TigerPride271 view image

For a tasty Thursday, 4-23, we will have Scalloped potatoes and ham, green beans, hot roll, fruit, and milk. Next day breakfast, Pancakes, juice, milk.
Come get a yummy meal, share smile and see our amazing teachers and staff!
